alert.note: Alert for Florence; Northern Marinette County; Northern Oconto County; Southern Marinette County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 8:32PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Florence, Marinette and central Oconto Counties through 915 PM CDT... At 832 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Kingsford to near Wausaukee to near Legend Lake. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Wausaukee around 835 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Oconto. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for northeastern Wisconsin.

area.areaDesc: Florence; Northern Marinette County; Northern Oconto County; Southern Marinette County
